before_start: {"blocks":[{"key":"bhtbf","text":"Knee blocks are shipped on wet ice and received within 48 hours post-mortem from certified tissue banks. The average time from receiving the sample to harvesting cartilage from both knees is about 2 hours. Pictures are taken and macroscopic scoring of the cartilage is completed.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
description: {"blocks":[{"key":"3tgi2","text":"Cartilage from the medial femoral condyle is shaved for Single Cell RNAseq processing. The attached image indicates where the cartilage shavings are collected from.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

groups.title: Human BioMolecular Atlas Program (HuBMAP) Method Development Community

status.info: We use this protocol and it’s working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"f3nva","text":"Prepare harvesting area with sterile drapes, tools and gauze. All harvesting is completed within an aseptic environment.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"di3i0","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"dghn6","text":"Wipe down the knee blocks with 95% ethanol prior to opening the joint capsule.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"a837d","text":"Once the joint capsule is opened, the femur and tibia are disarticulated. Wet a sterile gauze with DPBS+1% Anti-Anti and use it to wipe down the cartilage and place it on the cartilage surface to keep moist.     ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":208,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":210,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"44ijn","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":120273,"mol_weight":0,"name":"1x DPBS","linfor":"","url":"http://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/14190144","sku":"14190144","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"886626E0B5CA11EC83BDF15D2A05D96E","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":137,"name":"Gibco - Thermo Fischer","link":"https://www.thermofisher.com/de/de/home/brands/gibco.html","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":9126,"mol_weight":0,"name":"Antibiotic-Antimycotic (100X)","linfor":"","url":"https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/15240062","sku":"15240062","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"C4713450B5C911EC83BDF15D2A05D96E","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":95,"name":"Thermo Fisher Scientific","link":"https://www.thermofisher.com/us/en/home.html","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2jdul","text":"Full-thickness medial femoral condyle cartilage is shaved from the bone using a #21 scalpel; pieces typically measure maximum 10mmX25mm. 1.5g of shaved cartilage tissue is collected into a 50mL tube that is filled with 40mLs of DMEM + 1% Anti-Anti, then placed in wet ice until the cell isolation protocol for scRNAseq begins.      ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":328,"length":1},{"key":1,"offset":330,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"c7lnf","text":" ","type":"atomic","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[{"key":2,"offset":0,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"fofd9","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":955290,"mol_weight":0,"name":"DMEM with L-Glutamine 4.5g/L Glucose and Sodium Pyruvate","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"MT-10-013-CV ","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"DF908008B5CE11ECB1F80A58A9FEAC02","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":31,"name":"Fisher Scientific","link":"https://www.fishersci.com/us/en/home.html","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}},"1":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":9126,"mol_weight":0,"name":"Antibiotic-Antimycotic (100X)","linfor":"","url":"https://www.thermofisher.com/order/catalog/product/15240062","sku":"15240062","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"DF90830FB5CE11ECB1F80A58A9FEAC02","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":95,"name":"Thermo Fisher Scientific","link":"https://www.thermofisher.com/us/en/home.html","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}},"2":{"type":"notes","mutability":"IMMUTABLE","data":{"blocks":[{"data":{},"depth":0,"entityRanges":[],"inlineStyleRanges":[],"key":"6fahk","text":"See Description Section for image of medial condyle area of interest.","type":"unstyled"}],"entityMap":{}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"21mkk","text":"Procurement of Medial Femoral Cartilage With Subchondral Bone for MERFISH: Using an autoclaved 12” hacksaw with 24TPI blade, cut a 3-5mm slab from the middle region of the medial condyle. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"586nf","text":"Three pieces of tissue are placed in 12mLs, per region, of   for 24hrs on a 4oC rocker. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":59,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":77,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":59,"length":1}],"data":{}},{"key":"f6cs5","text":"","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":955291,"mol_weight":0,"name":"PAXgene Tissue FIX","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"765312","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"0C51ACE0B5DA11EC83BDF15D2A05D96E","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":25,"name":"Qiagen","link":"https://www.qiagen.com/us/products/","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}}}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"98vq5","text":"Pour off fixation solution and replace with    and store at 4oC until shipment on wet ice or MERFISH protocol begins.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":61,"length":1}],"entityRanges":[{"key":0,"offset":44,"length":1}],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{"0":{"type":"reagents","mutability":"MUTABLE","data":{"id":955292,"mol_weight":0,"name":"PAXgene Tissue STABILIZER","linfor":"","url":"","sku":"765512","cas_number":"","rrid":"","public":1,"can_edit":0,"guid":"74572950B5DA11EC83BDF15D2A05D96E","in_steps":null,"vendor":{"id":25,"name":"Qiagen","link":"https://www.qiagen.com/us/products/","image":{"source":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png","placeholder":"/img/vendors/placeholder.png"}}}}}}
